About Me

Let me tell you a few things ...

BIO

Hey ! My name is Ashir Afzal & i am front end web and desktop developer as well as i do UI / UX stuff .In my job as front end developer its a part of my job to deliver the best for our customers it was necessary to design unique and adaptive design of web and mobile apps for our customers which gives me the ability yo develop unique and adaptive UI / UX designs for both mobile and web apps .I have 2 years of experience as a front developer developing unique and responsive websites for our customers according to thier bussiness needs and logic. I have also 1+ year expereince as an desktop application developer i have worked on complex desktop application software like point of sales , inventory & sales software for retail & fast food restaurants .

Front End Developer

HTML5 , CSS3 , Java script , JQueury , Ajax , PHP 7.0 , Bootstrap & Wordpress

I am web developer & i developed unique web apps . I have 2+ years of experience in the web developement in a startup . I am specialized in the front end development as well as i have brief understanding of backend developement using PHP 7.0 as backend programming , maria DB and mongo DB as database . My web developement skills include the following technologies i used for web apps developement HTML5 , CSS3 , Java script , Jquery , Ajax , PHP 7.0 , Bootstrap , Wordpress & Laravel .

Desktop Developer

Windows Form & WPF Apps Using C# .NET

I developed Windows Form & WPF desktop applications using C# .NET both offline and onine desktop applications . I have a rich experience in working in C# .Net . I have worked on complex desktop application using object oriented programming approach like point of sale , inventory management system , stock management system and sales softwares . I love to worked on complex desktop apps include complex algorithms to solve different complex problems .

UI / UX Designer

Responsive Web & Mobile Apps Designs

I also do UI / UX stuff for both web & mobile apps as i have mentioned in the above bio i have worked as a front end developer in a start up but to deliver our customer the best service and best user interface for their apps and websites i have to do also the UI / UX designs for our customer projects for the best designs for thier web and mobile apps which unlock my ability to think out of the box and to design new unique , adaptive and user friendly designs .
